message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this valuable product to you first. Given its worth, I'm proposing a starting price of $13,000.  What do you think?
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I understand its value, but I believe I can't justify spending $13,000 on it. Could you consider lowering the price to $10,000?
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I'm looking for a slightly higher return on this product.  Would you consider meeting me in the middle at $11,500?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget, could we possibly agree on $10,000 for the product?
